name: Aestheticats
description:
An evil sorceress named Hecate has sent out hordes of shadow monsters to invade the world of Aestheticats! She hates how each aesthetic can live so peacefully next to one another and believes they should be separate. It’s up to you to take back the world from Hecate’s grasp, one aesthetic at a time!

 

For anyone with a love for retro games, Aestheticats is a single player run-and-gun with a pixel art style, that focuses on quick combat and engaging platforming. Unlike other games, Aestheticats doesn't stick to one defined art direction, with many totally unique and interesting areas to explore.
